error.offline: Кажется, вы не подключены к сети...
error.submitError: Если ошибка повторяется, напишите на Discourse форум или создайте задачу на GitHub. Спасибо!

index.metaDescription: Соберите свой самодельый сенсор и станьте частью сети даных проекта гражданской науки, который развивается благодаря поддержке большого числа участников. 💕
index.metaTitle: Sensor.Community 🌐 Соберите свой сенсор и станьте частью всемирной сети сбора открытых данных
index.message-description: Sensor.Community это всемирная сеть сенсоров информация с которых доступна в виде открытых данные об окружающей среде.
index.message-mission: Наша миссия состоит в том, чтобы вдохновлять людей исследовать окружающую их среду, предоставляю для этого удобную платформу для коллективного сбора данных.
index.message-hubs: Sensor.Community имеет представительства в Штутгарте, Софии, Варшаве, Москве и других городах.

sensor.metaTitle: Find your sensor and building instructions for your DYI fine dust sensor
sensor.subtitle: Руководство по сборке собственного сенсора

donate.metaDescription: We are non-profit, non-corporate and non-compromised. People like you help us. We rely on donations to carry out our mission.
donate.metaTitle: Donate - help us by showing your love
donate.description: We are non-profit, non-corporate and non-compromised. People like you help us. We rely on donations to carry out our mission.
donate.donationDescription: The Open Knowledge Foundation Germany is recognised as a non-profit organisation.

contributors.description: Meet the team who is working behind the scenes to harness the power of Sensor.Community.
contributors.contactBottom: 📮Please use the contact options at the bottom of the page.

projects.metaDescription: Find mobile apps, websites,... from our lovely community 💖
projects.description: Find mobile apps, websites,... from our lovely community 💖️
projects.submitIdea: Have a great project? Share it with the community!

imprint.privacyPolicyDesc: With this privacy policy we would like to inform you about the type, scope and purpose of the processing of personal data on our website. Personal data are all data that have a personal reference to you, e.g. name, address, e-mail address or user behaviour. With regard to the terms used, such as "processing" or "responsible person", we refer to the definitions in Art. 4 of the Basic Data Protection Regulation (DSGVO)
imprint.privacyPolicyContactTitle: Contact via e-mail, social media or telephone
imprint.privacyPolicyContactDescription: As far as you address the e-mail, telephone or social media offered on our website and provide us with personal data, these data will be automatically stored and processed by our team to process your inquiry. These data are only processed for correspondence with you. We need your e-mail address to be able to answer your inquiry. We need your telephone number in order to be able to answer your callback request. Legal basis: The legal basis for the use of your data as described above is Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a DSGVO. Deletion: The personal data collected by us will be deleted if they are no longer required. We check the necessity every 2 years. You can also revoke the data processing at any time.
